verses.roman:
bhakta-gaṇa lañā kailā guṇḍicā mārjana
āiṭoṭā āsi' kailā vanya-bhojana

synonyms: bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; lañā—taking; kailā—performed; guṇḍicā mārjana—cleansing and washing of the Guṇḍicā temple; āiṭoṭā āsi'-coming to the nearby garden named Āiṭoṭā; kailā—had; vanya-bhojana—a picnic within the garden.
translation: After Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, taking all His devotees with Him, performed the Guṇḍicā-mārjana [washing and cleansing the temple Guṇḍicā], He went to the garden known as Āiṭoṭā and accepted prasāda at a picnic within the garden.
